amendatorysection.catchline: Judicial nominating commissions; members serve on no more than one commission; exceptions.
amendatorysection.para: Except for the Supreme Court members of judicial nominating commissions, no individual lawyer or citizen member of any judicial nominating commission shall serve on more than one judicial nominating commission at the same time; Provided, judicial nominating commissioners for the office of district judge may also serve as judicial nominating commissioners for county judge.
